Ownership Type[COMMENT: editor; the type of club ownership; e.g. PLC]
Limited Liability Company[COMMENT: LTD; means that a person's financial liability is limited to a fixed sum. e.g. Most British clubs fall under this category]
Public Limited Company[COMMENT: PLC; if the club is a public (floated) limited company (e.g. West Ham, West Brom, Juventus, Porto, Lyon, Ajax, this field should be used to indicate that]

Member-Owned (Elections/Ltd)[COMMENT: AREA: editor; SUB-AREA: club ownership type; FR-BN: 28943; TONE: Formal; CHARLIMIT: None; REF-ID: 349001; NOTE: if the club is owned by its members (e.g. German model) and holds elections to elect board of officials. Also includes those clubs run by a Supporters Trust - Ltd means Limited Company]

Member-Owned (No Elections/Ltd)[COMMENT: AREA: editor; SUB-AREA: club ownership type; FR-BN: 28943; TONE: Formal; CHARLIMIT: None; REF-ID: 349002; NOTE: if the club is owned by its members (e.g. German model) and doesn't hold elections to elect board of officials.
